Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 122 of file data_filtration.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Ret = array();
                        $Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $Settings->load_settings( $FiltrationScript );
                        
                        if( $Settings->get_setting( 'keys' , false ) )
                        {
                              $Settings->set_setting( 'keys' , explode( ',' , $Settings->get_setting( 'keys' ) ) );
                        }
                        
                        foreach( $Data as $k => $v )
                        {
                              if( $Settings->get_setting( 'keys' , false ) && is_integer( $k ) === false )
                              {
                                    if( array_search( $k ,  $Settings->get_setting( 'keys' ) ) === false )
                                    {
                                          continue;
                                    }
                              }

                              if( is_array( $v ) || is_object( $v ) )
                              {
                                    $Tmp = $this->filter_data( $v , $FiltrationScript );
                                    if( $Tmp !== false )
                                    {
                                          $Ret[ $k ] = $Tmp;
                                    }
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    if( $Settings->get_setting( 'filled' , false ) && strlen( $v ) == 0 )
                                    {
                                          continue;
                                    }
                                    
                                    $Ret[ $k ] = $v;
                              }
                        }
                        
                        if( count( $Ret ) )
                        {
                              return( $Ret );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              return( false );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
